name: Starter Deck Rework
description:
Starter Deck Rework reworks the starter deck of each vanilla character, making them more balanced and unique.


Each vanilla character's Strike and Defend has a unique upgrade that fits one of their gimmicks.

Ironclad has a Strike replaced with a new card, Frenzy - Lose 3 HP. Gain 1(+1) Strength.

The Silent has 1 Strike and 1 Defend removes to make her 4/4/1/1.
